scripts.submodule:init: git submodule update --init --recursive || git submodule add https://github.com/bluesky-social/atproto.git atproto
scripts.lex:build: tsc lex/main.ts lex/types.ts lex/config.ts lex/openapi.ts lex/util.ts --outDir lex/dist --module nodenext --moduleResolution nodenext --target es2022 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck
scripts.lex:generate: npm run lex:build && node lex/dist/main.js atproto/lexicons src/content/docs/lexicons
scripts.lex:generate:full: npm run submodule:update && npm run lex:generate
scripts.lex:status: echo 'Checking lexicon setup...' && ([ -e 'atproto/.git' ] && echo '‚úÖ Submodule initialized' || echo '‚ùå Submodule not initialized - run: npm run submodule:init') && ([ -d 'lex/dist' ] && echo '‚úÖ Generator built' || echo '‚ùå Generator not built - run: npm run lex:build') && ([ -d 'src/content/docs/lexicons' ] && echo '‚úÖ Docs directory exists' || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Docs not yet generated - run: npm run lex:generate')
scripts.lex:help:
echo '

' && echo 'See lex/README.md for detailed documentation
